sn55.22:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
sn55.22:4.3: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.22:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.22:4.6: “idaṃ, bhante, kapilavatthu iddhañceva phītañca bāhujaññaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ sambādhabyūhaṃ.
sn55.22:4.7: So khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ vā payirupāsitvā manobhāvanīye vā bhikkhū sāyanhasamayaṃ kapilavatthuṃ pavisanto;
sn55.22:4.13: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, tasmiṃ samaye mussateva bhagavantaṃ ārabbha sati, mussati dhammaṃ ārabbha sati, mussati saṅghaṃ ārabbha sati.
sn55.22:4.15: ‘imamhi cāhaṃ samaye kālaṃ kareyyaṃ, kā mayhaṃ gati, ko abhisamparāyo’”ti?
sn55.22:5.2: Apāpakaṃ te maraṇaṃ bhavissati apāpikā kālaṅkiriyā.
sn55.22:5.3: Catūhi kho, mahānāma, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro.
sn55.22:5.5: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.22:5.10: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.22:6.1: Seyyathāpi, mahānāma, rukkho pācīnaninno pācīnapoṇo pācīnapabbhāro, so mūlacchinno katamena papateyyā”ti?
sn55.22:6.2: “Yena, bhante, ninno yena poṇo yena pabbhāro”ti.
sn55.22:6.3: “Evameva kho, mahānāma, imehi catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro”ti.
